content: a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel easy crochet hanging basket pattern 1 this crochet pattern is written in us terms this hanging basket is worked in the round finished size is 12 inches tall x 13 inches wide ~ 30 5 cm x 33 cm when laid out flat but will stretch once things are put into it materials 175 yards of a #4 medium-weight yarn 5 00 mm h crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/rrz7-hlm8lq 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
